title: low lp every ranked game
body: is there a reason why im getting low lp every game? i get around 17 lp never more then 20 lp. and i always loose 20 or more. its rigged.

replies.body:
Since I don't want to give credit to the site where this info comes from and so I don't include its link, because well. But here we go

> MMR is an abbreviation for Match Making Rating. Shortly, MMR is a hidden rating everyone has which determines players you meet in solo queue and the amount of league points you gain or lose. If you gain about 17-20 league points per win, your MMR is usual for your current division. 
> 
> MMR is using same values as ELO system which has been in use before invention of division / league system. However exactly MMR determines players you meet in solo queue and LP gain or lose while league system shows your tier and progress publicly.
> 
> Everytime you win or lose, your MMR changes accordingly. Amount of MMR gain / lose depends on average MMR of players you faced in ranked game.
> 
> During a long win streak, MMR starts to outrun your current division / ELO. In this case you would receive up to 40 points per win while lose only about 10-15. Such MMR allows to jump over division, e.g. Gold 5 to Gold 3. However itâ€™s compensated the fact that you wouldl be matched against opponents 2-5 divisions above yours.
> 
> If you experience hard lose streak then the hell happens. Amount of league points you gain is about 8-12 while you can lose up to 30.
